title: Mystery Champion
body: Why can't I use the mystery champion interaction. I have 10 champions available (including Zoe) and it says I do not have enough champions left to buy a mystery champion.

replies.body: If Zoe would have made your 10th unpurchased champion, you will likely need to wait a day or so for her to be added to the mystery pool.

Should there not be a disclaimer that the mystery champion does not include new 7800 Blue Essence champions? I have the same issue as OP. I have 10 Champions I do not own and none are on the "free champion weekly rotation" which also affects the minimum 10 champs required.
